intent_atoms.description: Triage polish items from Integrity tab release to keep table interactions, sorting refinements, and exporter hooks aligned with ribbon metrics and DocumentSession navigation.
Sorting polish (#T36-001,#T36-002) must produce deterministic ordering matching CLI exports on large fixture sets.
Navigation cue review (#T36-003) must restore Explorer tab selection reliably after state store refactors when focusing an issue row.
Metrics health check must spot-audit ribbon versus tab counts after tolerance parsing fixture regenerations to surface regressions quickly.
Running swift test --filter IntegritySummaryViewTests validates updated ordering expectations after sorting refinements ship.
UI automation coverage must confirm severity filtering keeps outline badges synchronized.
Exports for corrupt fixtures (Tests/Fixtures/Corrupt/*) must match plaintext/JSON summaries with table counts.
Table interactions, sorting refinements, and exporter hooks must remain aligned with ribbon metrics and DocumentSession navigation.
Audit @todo markers in Sources/ISOInspectorApp/Integrity/IntegritySummaryView.swift and IntegritySummaryViewModel.swift to translate into discrete follow-up tasks for backlog.
Coordinate design to confirm final filter/button layout before freezing automation screenshots.
Draft acceptance criteria for T3.7 (issue navigation filters) based on backlog guidance in DOCS/AI/ISOViewer/ISOInspector_PRD_TODO.md.
